ValidationRule.description: Users cannot add a non-growth product directly in Salesforce
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Contract_Number__c), ISPICKVAL(Change_Classification__c, 'No'), ISNEW(), OR( $Profile.Name = 'BG Base', $Profile.Name = 'Enterprise Onboarding', $Profile.Name = 'Coverage Sales', $Profile.Name = 'Customer Onboarding', $Profile.Name = 'PartnerInfo Agreement Admin', $Profile.Name = 'PartnerInfo Read Only', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Operations', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Operation Super User', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Read Only', $Profile.Name = 'Sales Admin', $Profile.Name = 'SecurePay SuperUser' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Non growth products can only be added via the Opportunity. Please select YES to Is Growth? or return to your opportunity.
